Here's a diverse list of radio stations from Hungary for your enjoyment:

1. **Dance Wave!** - Perfect for fans of club dance, electronic, house, and trance music. It streams in English.
2. **Dance Wave Retro!** - Brings back the 90s dance hits. It's also in English.
3. **RÃ¡diÃ³ 1 - Budapest** - A local favorite in Budapest, offering a mix of popular tunes.
4. **Kossuth RÃ¡diÃ³** - Focuses on news, public radio content, and talk shows in Hungarian.
5. **Mercy RÃ¡diÃ³ - KabarÃ©** - Offers comedy and talk in Hungarian, ideal for a good laugh.
6. **PetÅ‘fi RÃ¡diÃ³** - Plays alternative and pop music, part of the Duna media family, broadcasting in Hungarian.
7. **MegaDance RÃ¡diÃ³** - For those who can't get enough of dance music, with broadcasts in Hungarian.
8. **Oxygen The 80s Hits** - Takes you back with classic hits from the 80s.
9. **SlÃ¡ger FM** - Features classic hits from the 80s and 90s, catering to nostalgia lovers, in Hungarian.
10. **InforÃ¡diÃ³** - Offers news and talk in Hungarian for those who want to stay informed.

Each station offers something unique, whether you're looking for the latest hits, nostalgic tunes, or staying informed with news and talk shows. Enjoy exploring the sounds of Hungary!

Here are some jazz radio stations from Hungary that you might enjoy:

1. **BartÃ³k RÃ¡diÃ³** - Offers a mix of classical, cultural content, jazz, and public radio programming. Stream quality is at 320kbps. [Listen here](http://mr-stream.mediaconnect.hu/4742/mr3hq.mp3)

2. **Jazzy** - A dedicated jazz station. The stream is available at 192kbps. [Listen here](https://radio.musorok.org/listen/jazzy/jazzy.mp3)

3. **Tilos RÃ¡diÃ³ 32 kbit/sec** - Features a blend of jazz and rock. The stream quality is at 32kbps. [Listen here](http://stream.tilos.hu/tilos_32.mp3)

4. **Jazzy Groove** - Focuses on groove and smooth jazz. The stream is at 192kbps. [Listen here](https://radio.musorok.org/listen/jazzygroove/jazzygroove.mp3)

5. **COOLFM Jazz** - Plays jazz and smooth jazz tunes. The stream quality is at 128kbps. [Listen here](https://mediagw.e-tiger.net/stream/zc13)

6. **Jazzy Soul** - A mix of jazz, smooth jazz, and soul. Stream quality information is not specified. [Listen here](https://radio.musorok.org/listen/jazzysoul/jazzysoul.mp3)

7. **Jazzy Cool** - Features jazz and smooth jazz. The stream is available at 192kbps. [Listen here](https://radio.musorok.org/listen/jazzycool/jazzycool.mp3)

8. **Jazzradio.hu** - Dedicated to jazz music. The stream is in OGG format. [Listen here](https://www.jazzradio.hu:8000/jazzradio_192.ogg)

9. **MR5 - Parlamenti AdÃ¡sok** - Offers a mix of jazz, news, politics, and public radio content. Stream quality is at 64kbps. [Listen here](https://mr-stream.connectmedia.hu/4746/mr5.mp3)

10. **Diveky-radio-swing** - Focuses on jazz music. The stream quality is at 128kbps. [Listen here](http://178.238.223.39:8000/swing)

Each of these stations offers a unique take on jazz, from traditional to smooth jazz and groove, providing a rich listening experience for any jazz aficionado in Hungary.

Here's a list of radio stations with 'BBC' in their name, featuring a variety of content from news and talk to specific language services:

1. **BBC World Service** - Offers news and talk content primarily in English. It's one of the most widely recognized global news services. [Listen here](http://stream.live.vc.bbcmedia.co.uk/bbc_world_service)

2. Another **BBC World Service** station, similar to the first, also focusing on news and BBC content. [Listen here](https://stream.live.vc.bbcmedia.co.uk/bbc_world_service)

3. **BBC Afrique Radio** - Provides news and talk in both English and French, with a focus on Africa. [Listen here](http://a.files.bbci.co.uk/media/live/manifesto/audio/simulcast/hls/nonuk/sbr_low/ak/bbc_afrique_radio.m3u8)

4. **BBC Nepali** - Dedicated to delivering news in Nepali. [Listen here](https://stream.live.vc.bbcmedia.co.uk/bbc_nepali_radio)

5. **BBC Arabic Radio** - Offers news and talk content in Arabic and English, with a focus on Arabic-speaking audiences. [Listen here](http://a.files.bbci.co.uk/media/live/manifesto/audio/simulcast/hls/nonuk/sbr_low/ak/bbc_arabic_radio.m3u8)

6. **BBC Radio 4 (128k)** - Known for its comedy, drama, news, and talk shows in English. The exact stream quality or format wasn't specified. [More information](http://as-hls-ww-live.akamaized.net/pool_55057080/live/ww/bbc_radio_fourfm/bbc_radio_fourfm.isml/bbc_radio_fourfm-audio%3d128000.norewind.m3u8)

7. Another **BBC World Service** station, focusing on news in English but with a different stream quality. [Listen here](http://a.files.bbci.co.uk/media/live/manifesto/audio/simulcast/hls/nonuk/sbr_low/ak/bbc_world_service.m3u8)

8. **BBC News HD (720P)** - Provides high-definition news in English, covering UK and world news. The stream quality suggests a video service. [Watch here](https://vs-hls-push-ww-live.akamaized.net/x=4/i=urn:bbc:pips:service:bbc_news_channel_hd/t=3840/v=pv14/b=5070016/main.m3u8)

9. Another **BBC World Service** option, offering global news with a lower stream bitrate. [Listen here](http://a.files.bbci.co.uk/media/live/manifesto/audio/simulcast/hls/nonuk/sbr_vlow/ak/bbc_world_service.m3u8)

10. **BBC UNHCR** - A unique service focusing on content for Afghanistan, presumably in partnership with the UNHCR. The streaming quality is standard. [Listen here](http://stream.live.vc.bbcmedia.co.uk/bbc_pashto_radio)

Each of these stations offers a different slice of the BBC's vast content offering, from world news to specific regional services in various languages.

1. **MANGORADIO** - Offers a mix of music and variety. [Listen here](https://mangoradio.stream.laut.fm/mangoradio)

[Listen here](http://sunsl.streamabc.net/sunsl-90er-mp3-192-9697679?sABC=69569r3s%230%23q7s809s74070n543n7p5213q6qr39235%23fgernz.fhafuvar-yvir.qr&aw_0_1st.playerid=stream.sunshine-live.de&amsparams=playerid:stream.sunshine-live.de;skey:1767284287)
